itemDescription: English army officer in the East India Company

wikipedia_page.main: Major-General Sir John Horsford KCB (13 May 1751 – 20 April 1817) was a British soldier who rose through the ranks to become a General in the East India Company's Bengal Army.

response: He was in charge of the Bengal Artillery in India at the rank of Colonel until he resigned in 1808, being replaced by John Horsford.
